cause.description:
Frontier College is hosting an eBay auction of Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, including a bookplate signed by J.K. Rowling, through the Frontier College First eDitions program.
Proceeds from Frontier College First eDitions auctions support Frontier College literacy programs in communities across Canada.
For more information on Frontier College First eDitions visit www.frontiercollegefoundation.ca.
Frontier College, Canada’s oldest literacy organization, invites you to bid on this exciting collectors’ item, and help Frontier College reach out to individuals who need and want to learn.
Frontier College. Literacy. Learning for Life. www.frontiercollege.ca
1. Signed Bookplated Harry Potter volume raises money for literacy
cause.mission: teach Canadians to read and write.
cause.name: Support Literacy and Frontier College. Bid on Harry Potter
